This is where you will find all of the exercises related to the R for data analysis course. There are four exercise sets in total, corresponding to four sets of lecture/demo videos, and a final assignment which is relevant to those of you who wish to get course credits for this course. 

New exercise sets will be revealed at the same time as the new lecture videos are uploaded to Moodle. If you have any questions, please use the Moodle forums to ask them.
